tool_description: Initializes order tracking systems and creates tracking records for orders assigned to warehouses.

customer_notification.description: Whether to send tracking notification to customer

error_messages: Invalid order ID: Order ID must be a non-empty string and exist in the system.
Invalid assignment ID: Assignment ID must be a valid warehouse assignment identifier.
Tracking system unavailable: Unable to connect to order tracking system.
Duplicate tracking record: Tracking record already exists for this order.
usage: Provide order_id and assignment_id to initialize order tracking. Optionally set customer_notification to control customer communications.

tracking_number.description: Unique tracking number for the order

tracking_url.description: URL for customer to track order status

notification_sent.description: Whether customer notification was sent successfully
